game.name: Meal: Mystery Escape Room
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A lavish dinner. A locked room. And a truth no one wants you to uncover. Meal: Mystery Escape Room is a cinematic puzzle adventure where every solved clue pulls you deeper into a web of secrets. Unravel an unforgettable night through story-driven escape-room challenges.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A lavish dinner. A locked room. And a truth no one wants you to uncover. Meal: Mystery Escape Room is a cinematic puzzle adventure where every solved clue pulls you deeper into a web of secrets. Unravel an unforgettable night through story-driven escape-room challenges.
